function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 across multiple countries","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, scarcity of resources, and shortage of hospital beds and healthcare professionals","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce the spread of the virus and delay the peak of hospitalization","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technology, and telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, and technology developers"},{"Description":"Global economic recession and mental health problems","Impact":"Economic downturn, increase in unemployment, and rise in mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide financial assistance, support mental health services, and implement targeted interventions for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Online mental health platforms, virtual therapy sessions, and financial assistance programs","People":"General population, individuals affected by job loss, and vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government authorities, mental health organizations, and financial institutions"}]}
